For those of you used to WifiSlax and do not wish to have to use the Live CD every time you want to use this wonderful program, here I present version 4.1.1 already installed on a virtual machine and the "VMware tools" also in place, so you just have to, after installing VMware Workstation 12.1.1 (or newer), download the file, unzip it and open the right file with VMware
